mapper.insert: insert into t_cdesign_account (id, semester, coursedesign, coursedesign_name, major, grade, class_num, week_num, preday, workload, period, campus, creator, create_date, remark) values(#{id }, #{semester }, #{courseDesign.id }, #{coursedesignName }, #{major.id }, #{grade }, #{classNum }, #{weekNum }, #{preday }, #{workload }, #{period }, #{campus }, #{creator.id }, #{createDate }, #{remark })
mapper.update: update t_cdesign_account set grade = #{grade }, class_num = #{classNum }, week_num = #{weekNum }, preday = #{preday }, workload = #{workload }, period = #{period }, campus = #{campus }, remark = #{remark } where id = #{id }
mapper.select: select cda.id as cda_id, cda.semester as cda_semester, cda.coursedesign as cda_coursedesign, cda.coursedesign_name as cda_coursedesign_name, cda.major as cda_major, cda.grade as cda_grade, cda.class_num as cda_class_num, cda.week_num as cda_week_num, cda.preday as cda_preday, cda.workload as cda_workload, cda.period as cda_period, cda.campus as cda_campus, cda.creator as cda_creator, cda.create_date as cda_create_date, cda.remark as cda_remark, cda.status as cda_status, cd.id as cd_id, cd.name as cd_name, m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, u.id as u_id, u.name as u_name from t_cdesign_account cda left join t_coursedesign cd on cd.id = cda.coursedesign left join t_major m on m.id = cda.major left join t_user u on u.id = cda.creator WHERE cda.id = #{id }
